intro.only-members: Only DeepMine team members are allowed access

mining.tooltipAroundConsumables: This is where improvements are installed that allow you to make mining more efficient. They will be available for the Mine level 1
mining.doWantStopMining: Do you really want to stop mining?
mining.consumablesWillBurnOut: Your consumables will burn out and you won’t be able to use them anymore

signingContract.title: Signing the contract
signingContract.description: You should find or create a contract with a Mine Owner to start mining

welcome.title: Welcome, Citizen
welcome.description: You need full equipment set in your active inventory. Check your storage or go to Market to buy.
welcome.descriptionMobile: You need full equipment set in your active inventory.

setup.title: set up the Equipment
setup.description:
To start mining you need to install the equipment 
and you need to perform a physical shit to this location.
setup.descriptionShort: To start mining we need to install the equipment

ready.title: ready to mine
ready.description: You are all set, proceed to the Mining Deck to start mining

miningError.title: mining Was interrupted
miningError.description: Go to the Mining deck to see the cause

miningOver.title: mining is over
miningOver.description: Proceed to the Mining Deck to finalize mining

physicalShiftBadge.text: Do you want to travel here?

mineOwner.needMineCardDesktop: You need a Mine card in your active inventory. Check your storage or go to Market to buy one.
mineOwner.needMineCardMobile: You need a Mine card in your active inventory
mineOwner.needShift: To start the Mine you need to perform a physical shit to this location
mineOwner.needLandLord: Choose a card and sign a contract with the landlord
